    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public boolean tick(Background map,
                    Timer timer)
        Creates a new Lives object.
        Parameters:
        map - The map object
        timer - The timer object
        Returns:
        If the player collides with an explosion or enemy, return the value of kill(). If the player has reached the goal, return true. Otherwise, return false.

      • kill

        public boolean kill(Background map,
                    Timer timer)
        Removes 1 life from the player and returns true if they have 0 lives left, otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        map - The map object
        timer - The timer object
        Returns:
        Return true if the player has 0 lives, otherwise return false.

      • checkEnemy

        public boolean checkEnemy()
        Checks whether there are any enemies in the same position as the player.
        Returns:
        Return true if an enemy if found, otherwise return false.

      • checkGoalReached

        public boolean checkGoalReached()
        Checks whether the player is in the same position as the goal position.
        Returns:
        Return true if the goal is reached, otherwise return false.
